title: Кресло
overview: Misha's life was not going well. Overnight he lost his girlfriend, his job and his confidence in the future. Having bought a chair on Avito, he finds inside a folder with documents and a huge amount of money belonging to the right hand of the city governor. Thinking about what to do with the find, Mikhail begins to little by little correct the communal shortcomings in the yard, which earns the respect of the residents and the status of a people's deputy. However, the governor discovers that documents are missing, and elections are coming soon in the city. Will popular love and a mysterious folder help Misha take the governor's chair?
